title: Gravaa on the Fly Tire Pressure Adjustment: Gimmick or Great?
content:
This bold new piece of tech might have made the difference for Marianne Vos at gravel worlds. We got a look at it for ourselves.

Read the full article at Gravaa on the Fly Tire Pressure Adjustment: Gimmick or Great? on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
